left = blender <----------------------> right = ksp

It looks like you scaled something somewhere along one or two axes.
Hmm, I can't find a two axes scaling in my blender model. In that case the distortion would be visible in blender too, I think.
Try checking anything in the Unity scene and cfg. Any kind of scaling could be the culprit.
